RumorFact.Text: The dead tree asked me to land on that huge golf ball around the purple star. I didn't know tree could talk and I still don't know if they can be trusted...

ExploreFact.Text: Turns out I saved the tree from whatever. Now we're best buddies!
Seems like the dev wanted to chill inside the game and got assaulted by a scary fish. Ok fine whatever.

ExploreFact.Text: The anglerfish I met seems quite a known figure around here. These people are crazy!
I seem to have offended the dev by skipping their boring commentary. Good thing I don't care!
How is that cheating! That's just how this game works!

RumorFact.Text: Could not find rumor text! Please complain to the mod author. Don't let them sleep until you get the rumor text you rightfully deserve!

ExploreFact.Text: I deactivated the whole mod from the settings. Unfortunately it came back!
